entities.description: The number of offenders related to a particular case.
Unweighted frequency of cases with a specified number of offenders.
Details and statistics on the dataset such as the mean, median, mode, min, max, and standard deviation.
The amount of data that was not collected or is missing in the dataset.
Indicates cases where the number of offenders is unknown for a specific offense.

relationships.description: Relates a case to the number of offenders involved.
Indicates the frequency of cases with a particular number of offenders.
Relates a dataset to its summary statistics and data details.
Indicates the amount of missing data in the dataset.
Indicates cases where the number of offenders is unknown.
